main.description: An observed economic flow, as opposed to a flow planned to happen in the future. This could reflect a change in the quantity of an economic resource.

action.description: Relates an economic event to a verb, such as consume, produce, work, improve, etc.

provider.description: The economic agent from whom the actual economic event is initiated

receiver.description: The economic agent whom the actual economic event is for

resourceInventoriedAs.description: Economic resource involved in the economic event

toResourceInventoriedAs.description: Additional economic resource on the receiving side for transfers or moves

resourceClassifiedAs.description: References concepts in a common taxonomy for categorization

resourceQuantity.description: The amount and unit of the economic resource counted or inventoried

effortQuantity.description: The amount and unit of the work or use or citation effort-based action

hasBeginning.description: The beginning of the economic event

hasEnd.description: The end of the economic event

hasPointInTime.description: The date/time at which the economic event occurred

inputOf.description: Defines the process for which this event is an input

outputOf.description: Defines the process for which this event is an output

agreedIn.description: Reference to an agreement between agents which specifies the rules governing this event

triggeredBy.description: References another economic event that implied this economic event

resourceConformsTo.description: The primary resource specification or definition of an existing or potential economic resource

atLocation.description: The place where an economic event occurs. Usually mappable.

toLocation.description: The new location of the receiver resource for transfers or moves

inScopeOf.description: Grouping around something to create a boundary or context, used for documenting, accounting, planning

resourceQuantityHas.description: Reference to ProductBatch for lot/batch tracking

deletable.description: The economic event can be safely deleted, has no dependent information
